arrayPaintAndMove(Graphics) - Method in class game.SpaceInvaders

arrayPaintAndMoveBoss(Graphics) - Method in class game.SpaceInvaders
The following method moves the superA object which is the boss element in a square path (300 by 300) arround the screen and it rotates it in order for it too face the direction it is going.
